panels.title: Total Capacity Overview of Current Selection

targets.expr: sort(max by (compute_host, total, running_vms, enabled, disabled_reason, workload_type, availability_zone, cpu_architecture, hypervisor_family) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="cpu", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family"}) / 100)

sort(sum by (compute_host) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="cpu", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family" }) / 
count by (compute_host) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="cpu", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family"  }))

sort(max by (compute_host, total, running_vms, enabled, disabled_reason, workload_type, availability_zone, cpu_architecture, hypervisor_family) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="ram", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family"}) / 100)

count by (compute_host) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="ram", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family"}))

sort(max by (compute_host, total, running_vms, enabled, disabled_reason, workload_type, availability_zone, cpu_architecture, hypervisor_family) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="disk", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family"}) / 100)

sort(sum by (compute_host) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="disk", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family" }) / 
count by (compute_host) (100-cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{resource="disk", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family" }))

panels.description: See if the total allocatable cpus changed. This mainly for debugging purposes.

targets.expr:
sort(sum by (compute_host) (cortex_total_capacity_per_host{resource="cpu", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family" }) / 
count by (compute_host) (cortex_total_capacity_per_host{resource="cpu", availability_zone=~"$availability_zone", compute_host=~"$compute_host", hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family" }))
